name: Brooks Spartan Pants - Men's
description:
Tights are not for everyone. These pants have a more relaxed fit to keep you protected during your cool weather workouts. Ankle zippers let you easily change layers when you start to warm up and the DryLayer fabric moves sweat away from your skin so you stay dry and comfortable.Breathable DryLayer polyester and spandex wicks moisture and adds easy movement.Elastic waistband has a stretch internal drawcord for a comfortable fit.Offset reflective ankle zips.Semi-fitted cut allows room for layering.

        Sustainability
